name: Gemstones
description:
Casual Arcade-Puzzle game, where you move gems around to pair them together! Relax and get the highest score possible, earning cosmetics along the way.


How to Play:

Pair Gemstones Together to get the highest score possible!




Swap gems to get them in position to pair together. Each gem has a unique movement pattern!




Features:

-3 Gamemodes
-9 Unique Gems
-12 Unlockable Cosmetics
-42 Steam Achievements
